definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
Nanhaizi, name used to refer to various places, including 草海[Cao3 hai3], 南苑[Nan2 yuan4] and the Nanhaizi Wetland in Baotou, Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: What he brings us is how to look for the raw mate…
sentences.chinese: 海子给我们的启示是如何寻找文学的原始材料。

sentences.english: On that day, due to Yihe's introduction, I firstly met Haizi.
sentences.chinese: 那一天，因骆一禾引见，我与海子初次相识。

sentences.english: Okay children, we'll clear up room now.
sentences.chinese: 好敛，海子们，咱们现在大扫房煎吧。

sentences.english: Dark image cluster is the theme image of Hai Zi's poems.
sentences.chinese: 黑暗意象丛是海子诗歌的主题意象所在。

sentences.english: Haizi and his poems are both special cultural being in history of Chinese contemporary poetry.
sentences.chinese: 海子及其诗歌是中国当代诗歌史上特殊的文化存在。

sentences.english: Karst lakes, a special morphology of fluvial karst, are well developed in Anlong, Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 贵州安龙一带海子较为发育，属流水喀斯特形态。

sentences.english: Each lake has some kind of connection with animals.
sentences.chinese: 原来我们看的每个海子都跟动物有关。

sentences.english: With 40 lakes which extend five kilometers along a valley, the spot covers an area of three square kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 四十个海子沿山谷绵亘五公里，幅员三平方公里。

sentences.english: Haizi is considered as a thinker, then a poet.
sentences.chinese: 海子首先是个思想家，其次才是一个诗人。

sentences.english: The Anlong karst lakes have specific hydrogeomorphologic origin in their formation.
sentences.chinese: 安龙海子的形成具有独特的水文地貌原因。

sentences.english: The death of Hai Zi is a heavy symbolization of post-new-poem-tide.
sentences.chinese: 海子之死是后新诗潮的沉重象征。

sentences.english: Before this, Haizi had told Yihe and me that he would write a great poem.
sentences.chinese: 在这之前，海子曾对我和一禾说，他要写一部大诗了。

sentences.english: Leaf the poem book of Haizi, catch a glimpse of such a monostich, he said.
sentences.chinese: 翻起海子的诗卷，瞥见这样一行诗句，他说。

sentences.english: The life of HaiZi is contradictory.
In Haizi there is a Five-Color Pond, the brightest lake in Jiuzhaigou.
sentences.chinese: 而其中的五彩池以九寨沟最明丽的海子著称。

definition: Misty Poetry, a post-Cultural Revolution poetry movement
Alexandr Sergeevich Pushkin (1799-1837), great Russian romantic poet
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
Rabindranath Tagore (1861-1941), Indian poet and writer
Khalil Gibran (1883-1931), Lebanese poet, writer and artist
